<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create IP Pool</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/mt/monitor/v1/interconnect/ip-pool"}></MethodEndpoint>



Create a new IP Pool by selecting either Prisma Access or get your own IP.
